name: Default OpenAI Settings
title: Default OpenAI Settings
ocr_prompt: Extract all text from this image. Return the result as clean, structured text maintaining the original layout and formatting where possible.
classification_prompt: Analyze this document image and classify it. Return a JSON object with: {"document_type": "invoice|receipt|purchase_order|quotation|delivery_note|other", "confidence": 0.95, "suggested_doctype": "Sales Invoice", "key_fields": ["customer_name", "date", "total"]}
extraction_prompt: Extract structured data from this document. Return a JSON object with all identifiable fields and their values. Use these field names when possible: customer_name, supplier_name, date, due_date, total, tax, subtotal, description, reference, address, phone, email, items (as array with name, quantity, rate, amount).
